nodes.title: Preparations for Release of Chaos Monkey Version 2.1.0
Fix maven missing plugin version warnings
Add Contribution Guidelines and PR Template
Add chaos monkey assault scheduler docs
Make tests run with Java 12 (by getting rid of powermock)
Make watchers dynamically configurable at runtime
Issue 79: Same value for latencyRangeStart and latencyRangeEnd on LatencyAssault causes runtime error
Backport metrics feature of Chaos Monkey for Spring Boot v2.0.1
Added capability to inject arbitrary exceptions
fixes #61, both rest-controller and restController are possible to fetch now
fixes #61, both rest-controller and restController are valid now
name of killapp assault was wrong
Add support for raising configurable exception.
Update documentation to reflect the new increased max level
Make it possible to configure specific services to be watched
Bumped up max level to 100 for scenarios requiring sub-10% chaos
update pom.xml - spring versions, commons lang3
Additional tests and changes to trouble random
Upgrade to Spring Boot 2 and fix FileNotFound bug
Attack all public methods when watchedCustomService is a class reference
Allow any throwable in ExceptionAssault instead of only exceptions
Add .gitattributes to fix issues with devcontainer
Fix exception in KillAppAssault when using netty
Improve documentation for runtime assault triggers
Document extjar spring version should match
Add gradle (+kotlin) code tabs for dependency
Fix for #232 Unresolvable circular dependency when FactoryBean is annotated with @Component
👷 Create Github Release after deployment to maven central
Fix sometimes wrong spring.factories in external jar (#218)
Add ChaosToggle interface and update tests to account for new the ToggleType enum being passed
Fix: Assaults can be activated by actuator again
Bump actions/setup-java from v1 to v2
Clear changes.adoc and enable jekyll for github pages deployment
Bump peaceiris/actions-gh-pages from v3 to v3.8.0
Problem: Environment properties can clash with chaos monkey properties and prevent app start up
Bump actions/cache from v2 to v2.1.4
Problem: Proxying components that use BeanPostProcessor or ApplicationListener interfaces prevents Spring Boot application from starting up
fix vulnerability CVE-2020-25649 because of jackson-databind dependency
Adds a way to bootstrapping the Chaos Monkey.
Switch from Travis to Github Actions + Switch to "main" branch as default branch
Upgrade dependencies and upgrade to JUnit 5
Problem: Proxying final component classes results in IllegalArgumentException
Excluding final classes from watcher aspects
Use chaos monkey specific scheduler to avoid multiple scheduler confl…
Add dedicated cron for AppKiller and Memory assaults
Fix #72 - Serializing issue with spring cloud dependencies
Describe the API docs with OpenAPI, validate OpenAPI during build
Change default configuration to everything off and predictable values
Fix #161 - You can configure watcher in runtime see #84
Add spring boot formatter and checkstyle
Removing unecessary empty check on watchedCustomService
Created SpringRepositoryAspectJDBC for watching non-jpa repositories
Add Maven wrapper defining current version 3.6.2
Fix default values for latencyRange in docs
Remove deprecated MetricEvent constructor and adapt usage
fix(#128): MetricPublisher is using a deprecated API
Fix: CMSB deprecated API usage in MetricEventPublisher
Update dependencies to latest stable versions
Add context as dependecy to make sure cloud dependencies keep working
Fix #118 by excluding spring.cloud.context in component watcher
Fix broken gh-pages readme release link
Fix missing maven deploy plugin version warning
